docs.title: RAG Notes
docs.text:
Write notes in text files. Turn them into a website. Host it free.

Click How To Setup Your Own Notes to get started.

docs.title: Getting Started
docs.text:
Open Terminal (Cmd + Space, type Terminal, press Enter).

Run these commands:

mkdir -p ~/RAGprojects && cd ~/RAGprojects
uv init rag-notes --no-package
cd rag-notes
uv add mkdocs mkdocs-material
uv run mkdocs new .
uv run mkdocs serve --livereload

Open browser: http://127.0.0.1:8000

Stop server: Ctrl + C

Next: Upload to GitHub

docs.title: Deploy to GitHub Pages
docs.text:
Deploy your site:

uv run mkdocs gh-deploy

This builds your site and uploads it to GitHub. Wait 2-3 minutes.

Your site is live at: https://YOUR-USERNAME.github.io/rag-notes/

To update after changes:

git add . && git commit -m "Update" && git push && uv run mkdocs gh-deploy

docs.title: Upload to GitHub
docs.text:
Save and upload your project:

git add .
git commit -m "Initial commit"
gh repo create rag-notes --source=. --remote=origin --push --public

For future changes:

git add . && git commit -m "Update" && git push

Next: Deploy to GitHub Pages
